LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_EQ: Check if both inputs are equal.
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_NEQ: Check if both inputs are not equal.
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LT: Check if the first input is less than the second.
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_LTE: Check if the first input is less than or equal to the second.
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GT: Check if the first input is greater than the second.
LOGIC_COMPARE_TOOLTIP_GTE: Check if the first input is greater than or equal to the second.
CONTROLS_FLOW_STATEMENTS_TOOLTIP_CONTINU: Skip the rest of this loop and continue with the next iteration.
